resources.string: Qalisa ukulungisa ukuze ubone izilimi zakho lapha.
Ekugcineni uma uthola unkosikazi omusha, uyobona isithombe esihambisana laphaya.
Louise nguMfundisi wesi-Spanish oyenza ukusiza ukwazi ukuthi uhambe kahle kwezilimi zakho!
Gabriel ngumfotografa waseFrance oyakusiza ekubonakaliseni isici sakho sokwazi vocabulary!
Rakesh ngumfundi wase-Indiya eyunivesithi ozakusiza ukuthi uthole ukwazi okusezingeni eliphezulu kwezilimi zakho!
Evelyn ungukuhlonishwa obhizinisi obekwaBhritisini okuthandaza ukusiza wena ekwenzeni ukuphuhlisiwe kwesici kamesisindo sakho!
Ahsan ungumthengisi wezenzela i-Software yeArabic okuyakusiza ekunqobeni kwesikhululo sakho!
Min ungumhloli wase-China ozakusiza ekuphucula ukusetshenziswa kwakho kwesichazamazwi!
